title: Remote Hook Strategy Configuration
description: Schema for remote configuration of hook strategies in the Upwork Research Agent

schema_version.description: Semantic version of the config schema (X.Y.Z format)

min_app_version.description: Minimum application version required to use this config (X.Y.Z format)

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last configuration update

id.description: Unique identifier for the strategy (kebab-case recommended)

description.description: Detailed description of when and how to use this strategy
examples: Build credibility by referencing similar past projects and client outcomes
I recently completed a similar project for [client]...
Most freelancers would approach this by... but I'd take a different angle...

best_for.description: Description of ideal use cases for this strategy
examples: Projects where you have highly relevant past experience
Clients who have tried multiple approaches unsuccessfully

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the strategy

ab_weight.description: A/B testing weight for this strategy (0.0 = never selected, 1.0 = always selected when all others are 0.0)
